svg.text: Complete Architecture with Intelligent Cloud Routing

g.text: "How much did Gemini cost this week for customer cust_001?"
1Ô∏è‚É£ Parse query intent (model: Gemini ‚Üí cloud: GCP)
2Ô∏è‚É£ Check tenant cloud config (GCP: ‚úì, AWS: ‚úì, Azure: ‚úó)
‚úì Grafana can't call REST APIs directly ‚úì Intelligent multi-cloud routing ‚úì Tenant-aware access control
‚úì Aggregates responses from 3 clouds ‚úì Handles failures gracefully ‚úì Natural language understanding
Example: Data Flow for "How much did Gemini cost this week?"
‚úì Grafana Integration: Bridges Grafana ‚Üî MCP REST APIs
‚úì Intelligent Routing: Determines which clouds to query
‚úì Multi-Cloud Aggregation: Combines GCP + AWS + Azure
‚úì Failure Handling: Circuit breaker for cloud outages
Without Orchestrator: Grafana CANNOT call MCP servers!
Option 1: Google ADK with native MCP support (Recommended) | Option 2: Custom FastAPI with HTTP clients
Architecture Flow: User ‚Üí Grafana ‚Üí Orchestrator Agent ‚Üí MCP Servers (GCP/AWS/Azure) ‚Üí Response
Key: Orchestrator bridges Grafana dashboards with cloud-specific MCP server REST APIs
